languages.text: "Инквизиции известно, что Вистенца Вьятт много лет назад подпала под влияние еретиков, проникших в ее свиту, и исповедует богохульные верования, нашептанные Архиврагом. Мы не первый год пристально следим за Вистенцой и готовы положить конец ее маленьким мерзостям, как только они перешагнут черту и станут представлять настоящую опасность".

"The Inquisition knows that it has been many years since Vistenza Vyatt fell under the influence of the heretics who insinuated themselves into her entourage, and that she has adopted the blasphemous beliefs whispered to her by the Archenemy. For years we have kept a close eye on Vistenza. And we are ready to put an end to her little depravities the moment she crosses the line and becomes a true threat."
languages.original_text: "Инквизиции известно, что Вистенца Вьятт много лет назад подпала под влияние еретиков, проникших в ее свиту, и исповедует богохульные верования, нашептанные Архиврагом. Мы не первый год пристально следим за Вистенцой и готовы положить конец ее маленьким мерзостям, как только они перешагнут черту и станут представлять настоящую опасность".

For years we have kept a close eye on Vistenza. And we are ready to put an end to her little depravities the moment she crosses the line and becomes a true threat."

languages.text: “审判庭已经得知，异端分子多年前就渗透到了维丝坦萨·维亚特的随行人员之中，她也一直在受到那些异端分子的影响。她已经听信了混沌大敌的低语，改信了亵渎神明的邪教。这么多年来，我们一直在盯着维丝坦萨。一旦她越过了那条红线，成为了真正的威胁，我们就会立刻终止她的邪恶行径。”
languages.original_text: "The Inquisition knows that it has been many years since Vistenza Vyatt fell under the influence of the heretics who insinuated themselves into her entourage, and that she has adopted the blasphemous beliefs whispered to her by the Archenemy. For years we have kept a close eye on Vistenza. And we are ready to put an end to her little depravities the moment she crosses the line and becomes a true threat."

traits.locale_text: “审判庭已经得知，异端分子多年前就渗透到了维丝坦萨·维亚特的随行人员之中，她也一直在受到那些异端分子的影响。她已经听信了混沌大敌的低语，改信了亵渎神明的邪教。这么多年来，我们一直在盯着维丝坦萨。一旦她越过了那条红线，成为了真正的威胁，我们就会立刻终止她的邪恶行径。”

languages.text: «La Inquisición sabe que ya hace muchos años que Vistenza Vyatt cayó bajo la influencia de los herejes que se infiltraron en su séquito y que ha adoptado las creencias blasfemas que le susurra el Archienemigo. Hemos vigilado con atención a Vistenza durante años, y estamos listos para poner fin a sus pequeñas depravaciones en cuanto se pase de la raya y se convierta en una auténtica amenaza».
languages.original_text: "The Inquisition knows that it has been many years since Vistenza Vyatt fell under the influence of the heretics who insinuated themselves into her entourage, and that she has adopted the blasphemous beliefs whispered to her by the Archenemy. For years we have kept a close eye on Vistenza. And we are ready to put an end to her little depravities the moment she crosses the line and becomes a true threat."

traits.locale_text: «La Inquisición sabe que ya hace muchos años que Vistenza Vyatt cayó bajo la influencia de los herejes que se infiltraron en su séquito y que ha adoptado las creencias blasfemas que le susurra el Archienemigo. Hemos vigilado con atención a Vistenza durante años, y estamos listos para poner fin a sus pequeñas depravaciones en cuanto se pase de la raya y se convierta en una auténtica amenaza».

languages.text: 「ヴィステンツァ・ビャットがその取り巻きに潜り込んだ異端の影響下に堕ち、渾沌の勢力に耳打ちされた不敬な考えに同調してから何年も経っていることを、異端審問庁は把握済みだ。我々は長年ヴィステンツァを監視してきた。一線を越えて真の脅威となれば、ただちにわずかな腐敗を除く用意もある」
languages.original_text: "The Inquisition knows that it has been many years since Vistenza Vyatt fell under the influence of the heretics who insinuated themselves into her entourage, and that she has adopted the blasphemous beliefs whispered to her by the Archenemy. For years we have kept a close eye on Vistenza. And we are ready to put an end to her little depravities the moment she crosses the line and becomes a true threat."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴィステンツァ・ビャットがその取り巻きに潜り込んだ異端の影響下に堕ち、渾沌の勢力に耳打ちされた不敬な考えに同調してから何年も経っていることを、異端審問庁は把握済みだ。我々は長年ヴィステンツァを監視してきた。一線を越えて真の脅威となれば、ただちにわずかな腐敗を除く用意もある」

languages.text: « L'Inquisition sait que Vistenza Vyatt a cédé à l'influence des hérétiques qui se sont infiltrés dans son entourage depuis de nombreuses années, et qu'elle a adopté les croyances blasphématoires murmurées par le Grand Ennemi à son oreille. Ça fait bien longtemps que nous la tenons à l'œil et nous sommes prêts à mettre un terme à ses petites dépravations à l'instant même où elle se transformera en réelle menace. »
languages.original_text: "The Inquisition knows that it has been many years since Vistenza Vyatt fell under the influence of the heretics who insinuated themselves into her entourage, and that she has adopted the blasphemous beliefs whispered to her by the Archenemy. For years we have kept a close eye on Vistenza. And we are ready to put an end to her little depravities the moment she crosses the line and becomes a true threat."

traits.locale_text: « L'Inquisition sait que Vistenza Vyatt a cédé à l'influence des hérétiques qui se sont infiltrés dans son entourage depuis de nombreuses années, et qu'elle a adopté les croyances blasphématoires murmurées par le Grand Ennemi à son oreille. Ça fait bien longtemps que nous la tenons à l'œil et nous sommes prêts à mettre un terme à ses petites dépravations à l'instant même où elle se transformera en réelle menace. »

languages.text: "Die Inquisition weiß, dass Vistenza Vyatt schon vor vielen Jahren unter den Einfluss der Ketzer geriet, die sich in ihr Gefolge eingeschlichen hatten, und dass sie den blasphemischen Glauben übernommen hat, den der Erzfeind ihr eingeflüstert hat. Daher überwachen wir Vistenza seit Jahren sehr genau. Und wir sind bereit, ihren kleinen Abartigkeiten ein Ende zu bereiten, sobald sie die Linie überschreitet und zu einer echten Gefahr wird."
languages.original_text: "The Inquisition knows that it has been many years since Vistenza Vyatt fell under the influence of the heretics who insinuated themselves into her entourage, and that she has adopted the blasphemous beliefs whispered to her by the Archenemy. For years we have kept a close eye on Vistenza. And we are ready to put an end to her little depravities the moment she crosses the line and becomes a true threat."

traits.locale_text: "Die Inquisition weiß, dass Vistenza Vyatt schon vor vielen Jahren unter den Einfluss der Ketzer geriet, die sich in ihr Gefolge eingeschlichen hatten, und dass sie den blasphemischen Glauben übernommen hat, den der Erzfeind ihr eingeflüstert hat. Daher überwachen wir Vistenza seit Jahren sehr genau. Und wir sind bereit, ihren kleinen Abartigkeiten ein Ende zu bereiten, sobald sie die Linie überschreitet und zu einer echten Gefahr wird."

languages.text: "Engizisyon; Vistenza Vyatt'ın, maiyetine sızmayı başarmış kâfirlerin etkisi altında olduğunun ve Şerbaşı'nın onun kulağına fısıldadığı din dışı inançları benimsediğinin yıllardır farkındaydı. Yıllardır Vistenza'yı yakından izliyoruz, çizgiyi aştığı ve gerçekten tehlike oluşturduğu an an onu bertaraf etmeye hazırız."
languages.original_text: "The Inquisition knows that it has been many years since Vistenza Vyatt fell under the influence of the heretics who insinuated themselves into her entourage, and that she has adopted the blasphemous beliefs whispered to her by the Archenemy. For years we have kept a close eye on Vistenza. And we are ready to put an end to her little depravities the moment she crosses the line and becomes a true threat."

traits.locale_text: "Engizisyon, Vistenza Vyatt'ın, maiyetine sızmayı başarmış kâfirlerin etkisi altında olduğunun ve ona Şerbaşı tarafından fısıldanan din dışı inançları benimsediğinin yıllardır farkındaydı. Yıllardır Vistenza'yı yakından izliyoruz ve çizgiyi aştığı ve gerçek bir tehlike hâline geldiği an onu bertaraf etmeye hazırız."
